name: Vimium C
searchEngines:
map: https://www.google.co.jp/maps/?hl=ja&q=$s Google Maps
image: https://www.google.co.jp/search?tbm=isch&q=$s Google Images
icon: https://www.google.co.jp/search?as_st=y&tbm=isch&hl=ja&as_q=$s&safe=images&tbs=isz:i Google Icons
trend: https://www.google.co.jp/trends/explore?q=$s Google Trends
eiwa: https://translate.google.com/#en/ja/$s 英和翻訳
waei: https://translate.google.com/#ja/en/$s 和英翻訳
hub: https://github.com/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&o=desc&s=stars&q=$s GitHub
gem: https://rubygems.org/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&query=$s RubyGems
npmjs: https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=$s npm
photo: https://pixabay.com/ja/photos/?q=$s Pixabay
tw: https://twitter.com/search?q=$s&src=typd&lang=ja Twitter
amzn: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s/?field-keywords=$s Amazon

exclusionRules.passKeys: j k c / l n p o u e x s r a I ? gi gs gt gd ga gc

keyMappings: # ナビゲーション map h goBack map l goForward map zh scrollLeft map zl scrollRight # 表示 map R reload hard map + zoomIn map - zoomOut map = zoomReset # タブ map H previousTab map L nextTab map d removeTab map q removeTab map u restoreTab map ,p togglePinTab # ウィンドウ map w createTab map W duplicateTab # マーク map m Marks.activateCreate map gm Marks.activate # クイックアクセス map gb openUrl url="chrome://bookmarks" map gd openUrl url="chrome://downloads" map ge openUrl url="chrome://extensions" # ヤンク（copyWindowInfo） map y copyCurrentUrl map Y copyWindowInfo format="${title}\n${url}" map gy copyWindowInfo format="${title}\n${url}" map gY copyWindowInfo format="[${title}](${url})" map ,gy copyWindowInfo format="${title}" map ,y copyWindowInfo format="${title}" # タブ応用 map D removeTab goto="left" map U restoreTab map ,l moveTabRight count=99 map ,L moveTabLeft count=99 map ,t Vomnibar.activate bookmark # インサートモード (cVim互換) map editText run="auto,begin" map editText run="auto,end" map editText run="auto,backward,char" map editText run="auto,forward,char" map editText run="delete,forward,char" map editText run="auto,forward,word" map editText run="auto,backward,word" map editText run="delete,forward,lineboundary"
